thread.title: Sen. Bob Menendez Admonished By Senate Ethics Committee

author: Natalie Andrews
title: Sen. Bob Menendez Admonished By Senate Ethics Committee
text:
WASHINGTON—Sen. Bob Menendez (D., N.J.) was admonished by his Senate colleagues on Thursday for failing to disclose vacation costs and political contributions from a Florida eye doctor and ordered him to pay back the value of the gifts.
The Senate Ethics Committee, led by Sen. Johnny Isakson (R., Ga.), sent a public “letter of admonition” to Mr. Menendez, saying he “knowingly and repeatedly accepted gifts of significant value from” Salomon Melgen, a longtime political supporter.
...
